name: Programming for Engineers
body:
# Programming for Engineers  
## Featuring Excel Automation with VBA  
### An SPE YP Webinar Series
### Presented by [Derrick W. Turk](https://github.com/derrickturk) | [terminus data science, LLC](http://www.terminusdatascience.com)  

## Session 1: "Eat Your Vegetables"  
[Session 1 Slides](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/notes_day1.pptx?raw=true)  

Session 1 Finished Excel Workbooks:  
* [Hello VBA] (https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/hello_world.xlsm?raw=true)  
* [Funcs & Subs](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/funcs_and_subs.xlsm?raw=true)  
* [Pseudopressure](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/pseudopressure.xlsm?raw=true)  

Session 1 Code Examples: 
* [Hello VBA](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day1/HelloWorld.bas)  
* [Funcs & Subs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day1/FuncsAndSubs.bas)  
* [Pseudopressure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day1/PseudoPressureCalculation.bas)  

## Session 2: "Composite Materials"  
[Session 2 Slides](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day2/notes_day2.pptx?raw=true)  

Session 2 Finished Excel Workbooks:
* [Hyperbolic Decline](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day2/hyperbolic.xlsm?raw=true)  

Session 2 Code Examples:  
* [Hyperbolic Decline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day2/Hyperbolic.bas)  
* [Passing Modes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day2/PassingModes.bas)  

## Session 3: "Object Lesson"  
[Session 3 Slides](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day3/notes_day3.pptx?raw=true)  
[Well decline data workbook](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day3/well_declines.xlsx?raw=true)  

Session 3 Finished Excel Workbooks:  
* [Ballot Box](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day3/ballot_box.xlsm?raw=true)  
* [Decline Forecaster](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day3/forecaster.xlsm?raw=true)  

Session 3 Code Examples:  
* [Ballot Box Class](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day3/BallotBox.cls)  
* [Ballot Box Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day3/UseBallotBox.bas)  
* [Hyperbolic Decline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day3/Hyperbolic.bas)  
* [Decline Forecaster](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day3/ForecastWells.bas)  
* [Forecast Setup Form](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day3/ForecastSetup.frm)  

## Session 4: "One Small Step"  
[Session 4 Slides](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day4/notes_day4.pptx?raw=true)  

Session 4 Finished Excel Workbooks:  
* [Logger](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day4/logger.xlsm?raw=true)  
* [Improved Decline Forecaster](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day4/forecaster.xlsm?raw=true)  

Session 4 Code Examples:  
* [ILogger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/ILogger.cls)  
* [DebugLogger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/DebugLogger.cls)  
* [ExcelLogger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/ExcelLogger.cls)  
* [Logger Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/UseLogger.bas)  
* [IDecline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/IDecline.cls)  
* [Hyperbolic Decline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/HyperbolicDecline.cls)  
* [Duong Decline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/DuongDecline.cls)  
* [Decline Factory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/DeclineFactory.bas)  
* [Decline Forecaster](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/ForecastWells.bas)  
* [Forecast Setup Form](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/ForecastSetup.frm)  
* [Python Forecaster](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day4/forecaster.py)  

## References  
* [MSDN: VBA Language Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/gg264383.aspx)  
* [MSDN: Excel Object Model Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/ee861528.aspx)
